Posts.Content: PinkHope wrote: I have never been to a chat room but am chatting my husband to death!  I am recovering from breast cancer 1 1/2 years ago and it was brutal.  I now have another large lump in my breast.  Needle biopsy nonconclusive so the next step is MRI and core biopsy.  It has been 3 weeks (thank you insurance) and will be another 3 weeks for the MRI and biospy.  I am numb.  Do I plan for both scenarios, do I put it out of my mind...what do I do.  I find this is much harder than my first diagnosis.  I didn't know a thing then!  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: new to chat rooms/ help! PinkHope koshka1

Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2007 11:37PM PinkHope wrote: Don't worry because in the long run your husband should understand that almost 99% of the time it is all the HORRIBLE chemicals and pills talking NOT YOU:)!!!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: Desperate Housewives, "cancer bitch?" Catgo emmagoldman
